messages.subject: for your own good, stay ignorant
messages.msgSnippet: So, if you came here to learn from those who have gone before you then by all means, pull up a chair! But please, don t point fingers because the comfort
messages.messageBody:
"So, if you came here to learn from those who have gone before you
then by all
means, pull up a chair! But please, don't point fingers because the
comfort
level of what is being offered is beyond what you can take. "

That was very well put Nancy, you articulated the exact frustration
I've been feeling.
I've learned so much by being out of my comfort zone and having my
posts "picked apart" over the last couple of years.
It takes a strong fortitude to be able to examine oneself and admit
you could be doing something a lot better. Especially as related to
parenting/home/unschooling....but the results are wonderful.
It pays to remember that the people that ruffle our feathers
sometimes, are the ones that have lived the unschooling lifestyle for
a long time. The experience and the time spent with older kids and
how unschooling fits into all of that, is knowledge worth gold in my
opinion.

Ren
